TopicTitle: can we do something to declutter the map view.

Articles.Content: filters would be nice. sorry if they exist and i havent found them yet. they seem to exist in the tracking station though.

I found a neat trick:

- Uninstall KSP2

-Install KSP

- Install Tracking Station Evolved mod

- Install other visual/gameplay mods to mimick KSP2'S unrealized features

- Finally enjoy a robust gaming experience

 

In all seriousness though, I don't think you'll find a solution. The KSP2 experience is full of these missing features that would support a more robust play-through With development basically over I don't see any reason for modders to fill in the many existing gaps.
This suggestion for the game's development has been moved to Suggestions & Development.
